characters.name: Holden Caulfield
characters.description: The protagonist and narrator. A sixteen-year-old boy.

characters.name: Phoebe Caulfield
characters.description: Holden's ten-year-old sister. Intelligent and understanding.

reviews.comment: A classic coming-of-age story with a memorable protagonist.
Didn't connect with the protagonist's voice, but appreciated the themes.

characters.name: Frodo Baggins
characters.description: The main protagonist. A hobbit tasked with destroying the One Ring.

characters.name: Gandalf
characters.description: A wizard who guides the fellowship on their quest.

reviews.comment: A masterpiece of fantasy literature, with rich world-building and memorable characters.
Enjoyed the epic journey, but found some parts slow-paced.
